title: Montezuma Media
description: Montezuma Media is an adventure photography and video production company located in the Colorado High Country. Using PWA technology I was able to provide them with an optimized way to show off their work and not sacrifice site performance.

title: Limitless Wake Tech
description: A wakeboard instructor in Austin, Texas who was needing a way to get found easier online. Using SEO best practices, I built him a website that Google loves and impresses his clientel.

title: Aspen Applications
description: The website of my full service digital media small business. The business was created for marketing and brand recognition purposes. We offer web development, digital asset, and consulting services.

title: TensorFlow Color Classifier
description: This color classification application was build from a passion and curiousity for the potential of machine learning. It uses the TensorFlow JS library to train a model on RGB color data. A user can then pick any color and the application will categorize the color into one of nine categories.

title: Mountaineering Trivia
description: The first custom website that I build, Mountaineering Trivia is an edcuational game that teaches people about basic mountaineering equipment. Its main functionality is built using JavaScript, and the styling was created using CSS3.
